title: Diamond Floral Pendant Haaram with Jhumka Set
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricate floral design with open filigree work, meticulously crafted to showcase each diamond. The Haaram features a central square-cut Ruby and a lower circular Emerald pendant. Pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. The Jhumka echoes the floral theme with a similar Ruby detail and pearl drop. The necklace has a chain inspired by a waist belt.
colors: with vibrant accents of red (Ruby) and green (Emerald). The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and traditional festivals. Makes a stunning statement piece for the bride (pellikuturu) or any special occasion.
description: This exquisite Haaram set is a true heirloom piece. The classic design, combined with exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones, ensures timeless appeal and lasting value. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift or a treasured addition to your jewelry collection.
